data.outcome_description: At 08:52 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma moved to the kitchen.

data.narrative: At 08:52 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava pads out of the bedroom and into the kitchen. The apartment is dimly lit, the only light filtering in from the city outside. She flicks on the overhead light, the sudden brightness momentarily jarring.

data.details: Inspect the refrigerator and pantry to assess available ingredients for dinner.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_b797o8.last_obser: You take a moment to observe your surroundings.

data.outcome_description: At 08:53 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma looked around the kitchen_01.

data.narrative: At 08:53 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava surveys her kitchen. The stainless steel **refrigerator (fridge_kitchen_01)** hums quietly in the corner, its surface adorned with a few magnets holding up takeout menus and a grocery list. To its right, a narrow **pantry (pantry_kitchen_01)** stands slightly ajar. Above the countertop, **cabinets (cabinets_kitchen_01)** line the wall, their contents mostly hidden from view. A stack of mail sits haphazardly on the **countertop (countertop_kitchen_01)** near the toaster.

discovered_objects.name: Cabinets
discovered_objects.description: Cabinets lining the wall above the countertop.

data.details: Open the refrigerator to inspect its contents.

data.outcome_description: At 08:53 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma opened the refrigerator.

data.narrative: At 08:53 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava pulls open the **refrigerator (fridge_kitchen_01)** door. The fridge light spills out, illuminating a motley collection of leftovers, condiments, and half-empty containers. A carton of **eggs (eggs_fridge_01)** sits on the top shelf next to a container of what looks like **leftover pasta (pasta_fridge_01)**. The faint aroma of something vaguely spicy wafts out.

discovered_objects.name: Leftover Pasta
discovered_objects.description: A container of what looks like leftover pasta.

data.details: Check the leftover pasta to see if it's still good.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_b797o8.last_obser: The pasta seems alright, but it's a bit congealed and the sauce has thickened. Smells okay, but doesn't look super appetizing.

data.outcome_description: At 08:53 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma inspected the leftover pasta.

data.narrative: At 08:53 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava peers at the **leftover pasta (pasta_fridge_01)**, wrinkling her nose slightly. The sauce has thickened, and the noodles are a bit congealed. It smells okay, vaguely of cumin and chili, but the texture doesn't look particularly appetizing. She decides against it. "Not tonight," she murmurs to the **pasta (pasta_fridge_01)**, placing it back on the shelf.

data.details: Grab the carton of eggs from the refrigerator.
